item.content:encoded: In this talk I present a completely new development flow for creating mobile apps. React, Redux, Webpack etc. those are all subjects that we usually associate with web development, but what if it could be different?? I will show how we can use tools like before-mentioned ones to completely change the DX in mobile development, while not sacrificing the quality or the UX. I show how we can have hot reloading, iterative development, universal code that can be run on web, Android and iOS and all the other “little” awesome things that will make you love mobile development.
